    • Constructor Detail

      • RiskGUI

        public RiskGUI()
        Constructs a new RiskGUI object. Calls the JFrame superconstructor, then displays the splash screen and player setup screen using helper methods. Proceeds to the main screen, calls a helper method to set up the frame, and plays the game.

    • Method Detail

      • splashScreen

        public void splashScreen()
        Helper method to display a splash screen. Displays the Risk logo as well as information about the game and its developers, and plays the 1812 Overture.

      • setUpFrame

        public void setUpFrame()
        Helper method to set up the main screen. Arranges the map panel, side panel, and label.

      • setUpPlayers

        public void setUpPlayers()
        Helper method to set up players and listeners and assign colors to the players. Calls a helper method to display the player setup screen.

      • selectPlayers

        public void selectPlayers()
        Helper method to display the player setup screen. Prompts the user to select between two and six players inclusive. The user can customize player names and types.

      • setUpLabelPanel

        public void setUpLabelPanel()
        Helper method to set up the label panel at the bottom of the screen.

      • setLabel

        public void setLabel(java.lang.String message)
        Setter for the label panel message

        Main method to run the game
        Parameters:

      • territorySelected

        public void territorySelected(Territory t)
        Prompts the user to select a territory. Used in the initial territory claiming, army placement, and gameplay (attacking).
        Parameters:
        t -
